title: [Large-Scale] Augmented Reality-Based Blended Language Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic linguistic knowledge and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining mobile learning with personal devices and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Microlearning content can be designed to simulate real-world language usage contexts using AR technology
UX design principles can be applied to enhance learner engagement in blended learning environments
Formative assessments can iteratively improve the usability and educational effectiveness of AR learning tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
